noLang.MIX: [dark.db] Please select a language! (Lütfen bir dil seçiniz.)

notValidLang.MIX: [dark.db] Please select a valid language: EN or TR (Lütfen geçerli bir dil seçiniz: TR yada EN)

notValidFile.EN: [dark.db] The end of the filename must be '.json'!

noReadableData.EN: [dark.db] Specify the readability of the file: 'true' or 'false'

set_noData.EN: [dark.db] Enter the name where the data will be saved!

set_noValue.EN: [dark.db] Write the data to be saved!

get_noData.EN: [dark.db] Write the name of the data to be got!

delete_noData.EN: [dark.db] Write the name of the data to be deleted!

add_noData.EN: [dark.db] Type the name of the place where the data will be added!

add_noValue.EN: [dark.db] Write the value to be added to the data!

add_falseValue.EN: [dark.db] Data to be added must be numbers!

push_noData.EN: [dark.db] Type in which Array the data will be added!

push_noValue.EN: [dark.db] Write the value to be added to the data!

pull_noData.EN: [dark.db] Write the Array from which the data will be extracted!

pull_noValue.EN: [dark.db] Write the value to be subtracted from the Array!
